result.value: Java-based library to connect to the OMERO server
OMERO client library for QBiC's web portal - A Java-based library to access an OMERO server.

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features 🚀
* Feature/upgrade omero56 by @luiskuhn in https://github.com/qbicsoftware/omero-lib/pull/69
### Bugfixes 🪲
* Update Workflows to new requirements by @Steffengreiner in https://github.com/qbicsoftware/omero-lib/pull/65
### Documentation & CI 🪂
* Update GitHub Actions by @KochTobi in https://github.com/qbicsoftware/omero-lib/pull/67
### Others 🧃
* Fix SQL injection in hibernate-core by @Steffengreiner in https://github.com/qbicsoftware/omero-lib/pull/64
* Clean up Repo and add main branch rule to codeql workflow by @Steffengreiner in https://github.com/qbicsoftware/omero-lib/pull/66
* Sync for dev by @luiskuhn in https://github.com/qbicsoftware/omero-lib/pull/68
* Release/1.3.0 by @luiskuhn in https://github.com/qbicsoftware/omero-lib/pull/71

## New Contributors
* @Steffengreiner made their first contribution in https://github.com/qbicsoftware/omero-lib/pull/65

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/qbicsoftware/omero-lib/compare/1.2.1...1.3.1

result.name: Release 1.2.1

result.description:
* Throws RuntimeExceptions instead of Checked exceptions
* Fetches session uuid from omero
* Generates complete links for web image viewer
* Generates complete links for web image download
result.name: Sunny October

result.description:
## New Features

* Provide a method to obtain download link for a stored image
* Provide option to fetch metadata associated with a given image
* Provide a method to render a stored image into a BufferedImage object

## Fixes

* None
result.name: Dry August

result.description: For OMERO server v5.4. Contains basic functionality.
result.name: Release version 1.0.0

result.value:
To build this library use Maven and Java 8:

First compile the project and build an executable java archive:

.. code-block:: bash

    mvn clean package

Note that you will need java 8.
The JAR file will be created in the /target folder:

.. code-block:: bash

    |-target
    |---omero-client-lib-<version>.jar
    |---...

This library can be tested locally using:

.. code-block:: bash

    mvn clean install -U

Note that this will install the package locally as the version specified in the ``pom.xml``. See the following extract:

.. code-block:: xml

    <groupId>life.qbic</groupId>
    <artifactId>omero-client-lib</artifactId>
    <version>1.3.0</version>
    <name>OMERO client library</name>

This is a library and the most common way to use this library in particular is by including it in your ``pom.xml`` as a dependency:

.. code-block:: xml

    <dependency>
      <groupId>life.qbic</groupId>
      <artifactId>omero-client-lib</artifactId>
      <version>X.Y.Z</version>
    </dependency>
